alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Las Vegas Valley; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 6:45PM PST until January 22 at 12:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY EXTENDED UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Nevada and southeast California including Las Vegas. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions on east-to-west roadways for high- profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous crosswinds possible along Interstate 15 between Barstow-Daggett and Las Vegas as well as Interstate 40 between Barstow-Daggett and Needles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Las Vegas Valley; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
